citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:15PM on 20 April
2021. Contacted licensee on cell phone & he confirmed he was on travel status. Discussed sending in new travel
schedule & possibility of adding an additional authorized person as back up.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:15PM on 20 April 
2021. Contacted licensee on cell phone & he confirmed he was on travel status. Discussed sending in new travel 
schedule & possibility of adding an additional authorized person as back up. 
 
 
 
End Section
